website_summaries.verdict: UPF 50+ and comes in multiple colors to satisfy your child's fashion taste while protecting their skin.
pros: Customers rave about the lightweight fabric that keeps kids cool
Holds up well summer after summer
Offers options for both toddlers and big kids
cons: Some reviews suggest the sleeves run long

customer_reviews.title: sleeves are ridiculously long
customer_reviews.text: The sleeves are ridiculously long. No child in the world could have these measurements. I added a photo of another brand's rash guard laying into of this one. The white one fits my son perfectly, including the sleeves. comparing the two...The torso measurements are identical. But the sleeves are a good 6+ inches longer. I don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Color does NOT withstand use.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this product- the original color was BEAUTIFUL. Unfortunately, one week in the color faded... This after following the directions to rinse thoroughly following each swim in the pool. It was in the garbage three weeks following my original purchase. I had already purchased a second one in a different color before I realized the color would simply fade after one weeks use. I would love to reach to the company but I had difficulty, I would not recommend this product due to the rapid color fade.
customer_reviews.author: E. Richeal

customer_reviews.title: Garbage-2 different ones wore out in 2 weeks :(
customer_reviews.text: Total garbage. After only 2 weeks of wear on vacation, both the boys navy, and he girls pink look worn out (similar to other reviews). Don’t understand because this brand Kanu has been good for us in the past (older child has had the same one for 2 years and goof strong). I think material changed or something. Returning both. May have to switch to another brand. See pics!
customer_reviews.author: Bass Face

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, fantastic rashguard!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size medium/10 in white for my 10 year old, 54", 65lb son. It fits perfectly- I'm actually really impressed! After 15 days straight of sun, saltwater, chlorine pools, hiking, zip lining, rough sand play, and much more, it's still in terrific condition. It's fairly lightweight and stretchy- the neck isn't too small or big- my son has a "larger" head :) and some tops are so tight in the neck we end up taking them back. It was completely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mommyinor

customer_reviews.title: Great rashguard but extra long sleeves and emblem melts off.
customer_reviews.text: Great rashguard and nice rich navy blue color, however, as many others have said the sleeves are much too long for the body size. It still works well protecting my son from the sun and the sleeves bunch up, which are not overly cumbersome. It takes a bit of time feeding my 2 year olds arms through the long sleeves. *Update the white emblem melted off and stuck to my husbands skin while my son napped in my husbands arms under a shaded umbrella at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: HGE

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON please allow users to easily change return shipping method
customer_reviews.text: This swim shirt is about 2 sizes too small for my 7 year old ---he can barely put it on. However the main issue I have is that I accidentally hit the wrong return shipping button -- and now I CAN NOT go back and change my shipping printing label myself instead of finding a UPS store that has a scanner. I have been to 2 shipping stores and they cant scan and the UPS one that can is 30 miles away. I just want to be able to print the label myself and have not been able to reach the manufacturer or amazon. This SHOULD NOT be that difficult to change. Please help Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mc

customer_reviews.title: I consider my son to be pretty symmetrical from top to bottom
customer_reviews.text: The shirt is smaller than I was expecting, so it will be a tight fit. The shorts (same brand and size) are large on my son. I consider my son to be pretty symmetrical from top to bottom. Apparently, it is impossible to get this shirt in the aqua color! I have now received two shirts and both have been black, even though I ordered aqua (to match the swim trunks). The bar coded tags on the package which has "aqua" as the description. My email for help has gone unanswered.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Order larger than you think you need
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product three stars because it feels like a quality product, there are many color to choose from and it is a great price. However, the sizing seems off. I bought my smaller-than-average 12 year old son a size 12 in preparation for a summer 2020 multi-day canoe expedition. It just fit him which means that in 6 months he will have outgrown it. I exchanged for a size 14/16 and saw no discernible difference in size. Perhaps I just got unlucky and received a mislabeled shirt? Fortunately I was able to return for refund.
customer_reviews.author: AMHepworth

customer_reviews.title: No sunburns, mediocre quality
customer_reviews.text: These shirts are perfectly useful but have some flaws. The bright orange shirt was used one time in the sprinkler and faded to a pale orange color. The white one we have used occasionally this summer and I just noticed that one sleeve is super short. My son is not bothered so I suppose it’s not terribly important. He is a tallish six-year-old and these are size 8 (6-7 in a T-shirt usually) and they fit with just a touch of room to grow. So I suspect they run a tad small. However- no sunburns, comfy, no loose threads so I give the quality 3 stars and utility 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Held up all summer for 4 year olds.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my twin 4 year old boys for trip to Hawaii. Spent 2 weeks in water, ocean and pool. Never lost it's elasticity and they never got sunburned under. Stays tight around their bodies unlike other cheaper rash guards. Thicker material too. Only issue with white is you can sea sand stuck in between the fibers so it can look a bit dirty...but my kids are dirty all the time. HA! We're still using the same shirts months later and the quality has not changed.
customer_reviews.author: Magnum PI

customer_reviews.title: Quality has decreased dramatically.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one in 2017 with a black logo and it was great. Bought another (now with white logo) in 2018 its terrible. This was my son's favorite beach shirt, but finally wore out. I bought the exact same thing and not only was it comically tin. the quality was obviously inferior. The fabric was different, the stitching was crude. Sort of what I'd expect for $8 at the bargain store. Not for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Never

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: At first, the rash guard seemed like a good purchase. It protected my kid’s skin and fit as expected. But within a few wears, the stitching came undone. Also, the fabric snags quite easily, so it looks pretty shabby after just one week of near daily use. Other brands of rash guards have held up much better for the same kid. Next time I’ll spend the money on a higher quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Brain Damage

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 2T for my 18-month-old because I didn't want it to be hard to get off when wet. It was a little hard to put on him, because the neck hole is a little small, and the arms are a little skinny, but they stretch, so it is okay. I noticed the arms were a bit long when putting it on, but once he wore it for a little bit it wasn't noticeable. Getting the shirt off was easy. The shirt seems a little thin compared to the last couple I have owned, but as long as it still protects him from the sun, I don't care.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Doran

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase, disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We have bought this item a total of two times now. The first time we ordered a 2T. The 2T was a little big, but we didn't think anything of it. We use it all the time. The second time we ordered a 4T. The 4T is waaaay smaller than the 2T we ordered. The 4T looks like a 12month size. So strange. I wonder if they changed manufacturer or it's mislabeled.
customer_reviews.author: Sarai Foster

customer_reviews.title: Shirt is very, very small
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is totally mismarked, it is supposed to be a big boys 14/16 and it is more like a boys 10. My son didn't try it on until the return window had closed and now we are stuck with it. He had trouble as soon as he tried to put one arm through the sleeve, he couldn't even get it on one arm. The seller should take this back regardless of the return window.
customer_reviews.author: West485

customer_reviews.title: Great basic rash guard
customer_reviews.text: this is a basic rash guard that does the job. It has flat seams which is the main feature I was looking for since my son is sensitive about seams that stick out inside. I ordered a size 8 in navy blue. He wears size 8 in Osh Kosh brand and this fits the same (for reference, Osh Kosh tends to run slightly smaller than other brands in my experience). I have machine washed, air dried this shirt and it has retained size and color. Overall, I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing as after the first washing about 50% of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not wash with any other clothes! The amount of dye that comes out pales it several shades and it stains the rest of your laundry!
customer_reviews.author: MMartinez

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it; warning so popular there will be more than one kid at the beach with this rashguard
customer_reviews.text: We are really happy with this rashguard (and also own the one in white). Seems to block the sun and the color stays even after multiple pool and beach trips. The only warning is that this product seems so popular that I always see at least one more on the busy beach. Good value and kids love them! Some rashguards are way too tight at the neck- not this one. The kids never complain about wearing this one- they just pop it on and run to the pool/beach.
customer_reviews.author: Sigrid Ann

customer_reviews.title: Odd, but worthwhile purchase :-D
customer_reviews.text: My son wore it last summer, when he was 2.5 yo. It was a little big, but he didn't seem to mind. This summer, I had forgotten that we owned this and bought other ones (that were better fitting and my son liked better - nothing beats TMT or Spiderman). Anyhoo, this summer, my 6.5 yo girl found this and decided to wear it. It fit her perfectly :-D So, an odd, but good, buy. Certainly got my money's worth since it was worn by my son and daughter over the course of two summers. I expect my son will wear it again next summer...
customer_reviews.author: Deborah G

customer_reviews.title: This momma is sold! I’ll be buying the next size up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute great fitting rash guard. I bought this for my two-year-old son to wear with his paw patrol swim trunks. This top has washed in warm very well for the last couple months since we have began using it. It fits TTS and fit a little looser than What a regular rash guard would be. My son wears a Carter’s T-shirts 2T and this fit pretty similarly.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Ray

customer_reviews.title: Super durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. I’ve been buying these rash guards along with their coordinating shorts for years. They hold up so well and are comfortable. I’ve never had any problems with pilling or unraveling like you see with other brands. Impressive considering I throw these in the washing machine. These rash guards have a good stretch to them too so it’s easy to get over a kids head. A great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Bairdsley

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not there
customer_reviews.text: While the shirt accomplished my goal (protecting my little one's arms without the need for extra sunscreen in the blazing Mexico sun), the quality of the item is just not there. The rash guard was worn on ONE vacation. The decal is peeling off and sand is trapped throughout the material. His siblings had rash guards of other brands and surprise, no sand trapped. Also, re: sizing, my child is 3.5 years old. I bought the 5T and would not have wanted it any smaller. I would pass on this one, even though the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: RunningMomOf5

customer_reviews.title: Defective? Need replacement.
customer_reviews.text: How to contact seller? I think I received a defective or flawed product. I previously bought a rashguard and it lasted one full summer plus more. This one has been used maybe 10 times max in two months and the fabric is disintegrating, little white flecks shreds coming off and getting everywhere! Super disappointed. I have carefully rinsed it after every swim to avoid chlorine affecting it. Please send replacement Kanu Surf Big Boys Platinum Rashguard, long sleeve, navy, size large (12).
customer_reviews.author: Love4life2

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, small fit, go one or two sizes up.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirt. Good quality. Tight fit so might go up a size or two. The size 12 was too tight for my 10 year old boy who is tall and medium build. He does not like things tight to his body so I will order the XL (13-14) which should do him well. Gave the smaller one (L) to his younger brother.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Armour

customer_reviews.title: Color faded
customer_reviews.text: The new shirt looked like a good quality shirt, but the major issue is that the color faded very bad after the first time swimming at the beach pool. Over five days beach vacation, the color of the shirt totally gone... very unhappy with this purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: This is the second shirt we have ordered. The last one lasted a long time and my son enjoyed wearing it. This time I ordered a size 10. He is 7 yrs old but big for his age. It just fits. The neck and wrist feel a bit tight but not so tight we need to return. Just order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Morleymom

customer_reviews.title: Very tight head-hole and sleeves.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the white one for my 2.5 year old son. I ordered a size 2t (he typically wears 18 month swim shirts in other brands). I can barely get his head through the hole and same with his arms through the sleeves. Over never had this problem before. Once it’s on it’s fine, but it’s a struggle to get it on. I read reviews about ordering a size up, but my suggestion is order 2 sizes up. I don’t think I would order again just because it’s very uncomfortable for my son to put on and take off. Other than that it worked and kept the sun off his skin.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small
customer_reviews.text: Quality is fine. Sizes apparently run very small. I got a 10-12 & it was unbelievably small for my 9 year old grandson. Will give it to his much smaller friend. Too much trouble to return. Another swim shirt purchased on Amazon was just right!
customer_reviews.author: Reading Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Size up - very small
customer_reviews.text: We are lucky to be able to swim almost every day and as a result my son has a number of rash guards. The sizing of this rash guard is much smaller than all of the other ones he has. The fabric (white) also appeared a bit thin (we didn’t try it on him because it was obviously really small). If you do purchase, I recommend sizing up.
customer_reviews.author: Jay M

customer_reviews.title: Beach Ready!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! I couldn't believe how many rash guards of this particular brand I saw in Ocean City, NJ over the 4th of July holiday! I know they all came from Amazon lol! It protected my son's skin from burning and looked nice. It held up well against a full week of boogie boarding and beach play. I would give it 5 stars except my son said the collar was itchy. I did notice him scratching his neck a bit for the first day, but not too much during the rest of the week.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschoolchic

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you will be happy you did.
customer_reviews.text: This shirt was awesome! My son is 20 months and 35 pounds and tall for his age. I bought a 2T and it fit great. We went to point pleasant for a week and spent everyday on the beach with a UV index of 9-10 everyday. Zero sunburn and zero rash from the sand or the water.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Protect the skin
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Needed to exchange for a larger size as I ordered based on reviews stating they ran large. Not the case for my boys. The torso wasn't long enough when I ordered a size down. Many complain about the arm length. I agree that the arms are long, but it hasn't hindered my two kids at all. I'd rather have a longer arm length than too short for sure. I ordered the navy and a neon green one. The darker the color, the longer it will look new. Not an issue for me as beach clothes are beach clothes, but some may want them to last longer, stain wise.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good  Quality
customer_reviews.text: Have 18 month about 30 lbs grandson ordered size 3 goes over head fairly ez arms are a little long but stay rolled up Using in kiddie pool & splash pad No sunburn The material is balling pulling from concrete coping around the pool only complaint (He’s constantly climbing in and out )
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rubinstein

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product was excellent quality and it fully protected my young man (4T) who is very pale while at the NJ beach for four days. He didn’t complain of being hot or wanting to take it off. I like that it had long sleeves, for fuller protection. My son says he loves all of it, and just said long sleeves so his arm don’t get burned.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Burns

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, not great neck
customer_reviews.text: Body and arm fit okay, but neck opening is really small. Will update later this summer to see how it holds up over time. Ordered 5T for child weighing 42 pounds and 44 inches tall. For reference, the blue swim shirt in the photo is a size 4/5.
customer_reviews.author: Anne D.

customer_reviews.title: Fit good, protected tender baby skin, look good too
customer_reviews.text: My babies take lessons and this was my way of saving em from sunburn. Snug fit so it won't hinder to swim. Bright color so you can find your kid easily among all the other kids. Quality is excellent so is the price.
customer_reviews.author: Benito Lazcano

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: The first green one is XL, I just bought. The blue one is L I bought two years ago. My son grew and couldn't wear his Large kanu rashguard anymore. The one we got just now is as same as his old rashguard. Decided to return. The quality of this rashguard was good that made me buy it again. But the current size is way wrong. FYI, the third one in the back (yellowgreen) is mine, woman Small, I bought 2 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Orca

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. The neck comes up high enough to provide some protection, the torso is long enough that it doesn't expose my son's back when he bends over, and the arms are long enough to stay down and also allow unrestricted movement no matter what he's doing. The logo seems durable enough. We have not washed very many times, but it isn't peeling or cracking even after going through the dryer. I ordered the navy blue and am very happy with the color. I was afraid it may be too hot, but my very hot-natured son is not bothered even in our 100+ SC heat. I'll be ordering at least one more.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a size 6 for my 5 1/2 year old son and the fit was spot on, with a little room to grow. He'll definitely be able to wear it next spring! The color and quality (durable and soft) was good too. My son wore it for 5 hours and never complained about it. Will buy this shirt again whenever it's time.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs of these for my husband and my 4yo boy to use when they go fishing. I coordinated their colors. My husband said that it was very comfortable and was really surprised that in 95F weather, his body and underarms did not get sweaty. In fact, he said it felt cool. To make a long story short, he wanted me to order a 3rd pair. That coming from my hubby who is very picky with his shirts.
customer_reviews.author: F. Velez

customer_reviews.title: and good sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Sleeves are indeed a bit long, but I don't really mind that. I agree with the other reviews that it holds a metallic-like smell after use, even when washed with detergent. Not too big a deal if you don't use it constantly. But the company should probably look into that :) Otherwise vey cute, and good sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hanus

customer_reviews.title: Sized up and still too small
customer_reviews.text: Child is 2, I sized up and ordered a 3T. Not sure if its just us having this issue but it won’t fit over his head, at all. Thus the low rating. Not sure how I would rate it otherwise because we are unable to test it.
customer_reviews.author: k799

customer_reviews.title: Small head, unusually long arms
customer_reviews.text: The shirt is nice but the neck doesn’t stretch making it nearly impossible to get over my 22 month old sons head (as well as nearly impossible to get off!) and the sleeves have to be rolled up about 4 inches just to get to his wrists. I’m not sure who they used to pattern this for but it seems to be an odd cut. My son is quite average in size.
customer_reviews.author: TheAuntBee

customer_reviews.title: Fit small
customer_reviews.text: Fit small, extremely tight. I bought this for my son who is 10 years old, he weighs 92 pounds and is 5'0. I made sure to choose big boy and got him size Xl assuming it would be fine but it did not work out. He was bummed out.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with swim shirt. Ran a bit small but will be handed down soon anyway.
customer_reviews.author: C.  Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality but the size 4t I bought for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality but the size 4t I bought for my son was way too small and fit my 2t/3t son instead. We kept it for him and it is great but the sizing is wrong. If you wanted a very tight fit for under a wetsuit this might work in the stated sizing but we wanted it a little loose for playing on the beach to keep the sun off his skin.
customer_reviews.author: kellspo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome protection. Small neck.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for sun protection, awesome fabric, and great stretch, but I had to alter the neck to get it over his head. The neck was way too narrow. If your child has a large head, consider a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: M. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, quality and value for girls & boys
customer_reviews.text: Bought this "boys" rashguard in medium blue for my 4.5 y/o daughter with plans to pass it down to my son in a year or so. Love the Kanu brand and have purchased this rashguard for my husband, brother and son in the past. I wash in cold water and hang to dry to ensure the white logo doesn't erode. Fits true to size for kids and adults. Colors are vibrant and as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: goboilers05

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 3 yo
customer_reviews.text: This fit my son perfectly. He was 35 lbs and wearing a 3t in most clothes. He used it all summer for summing lessons. Probably won’t fit next year, but was a good deal. So much easier than using a gallon of SPF 1000 every time he swam.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper5

customer_reviews.title: Good product but sizing is difficult
customer_reviews.text: I tried to piece together the right sizing from the product reviews since I couldn't find a sizing chart from the manufacturer. I thought I was making the right choice by buying the size "small/8" for my averaged-sized 5 year old son. The neck fits just right, the torso is a bit big but acceptable and the sleeves are ridiculously long - they are about 50% too long. I'm not sure how any kid could fit these dimensions. I can roll up the sleeves, and the product seems high quality overall, so I'm keeping it. I just need to fold the end of each sleeve over several times so it fits. A decent sizing chart would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Great rashguard for 5-year-old boy!
customer_reviews.text: My active boy is very slim & skinny, less than 35lbs! Though it is alight bigger, but the rashguard comes along with solid structure & gd material. My boy actually look great with this rashguard on! Love it, will buy more on other colors. this is my 4th purchase. i gave bought yellow, peach, green in the past. we like the material. However thus red one seems to ve different in cutting & materials. Though it is still a nice rashguard, but i think it is not as good as the rest that we have....
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Great sun shirt
customer_reviews.text: This is my son’s third Kanu rash guard. I’ve found the long arms were more of an issue in the smaller sizes (like 2T) and is no longer a thing in my son’s current size (6). The shirt is well made and provides great sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine B.

customer_reviews.title: We received it and it runs a bit small and ...
customer_reviews.text: We received it and it runs a bit small and the logo on the front was already peeling off. We ended up peeling it the rest of the way off and it completely came off in about 3 or 4 pieces but you can still see where the vinyl was.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Medina

customer_reviews.title: small
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 3T for my 2 year old who weights 31 pounds and it was a struggle to get over his head. Once it was on it was so tight he looked uncomfortable. Would have returned, but needed an extra swim top for vacation that we were leaving on.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona25

customer_reviews.title: Wash before wearing alone! Bleeds in first wash.
customer_reviews.text: This shirt bled all over lighter things in the wash. Make sure to wash it before wearing. Bleach took out the stains but luckily the other stuff was white.
customer_reviews.author: Ten Myths Reader

customer_reviews.title: Fit is way too small. Order 3-4 sizes up!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son is average to "husky" in size. He is currently wearing normal 12/14 size tshirts in most brands. I read reviews that this swim shirt runs small so I ordered a big boys size 14/16. Got it today and it's so tiny he could barely get one arm & head in. Looks like it would fit a 7 year old. Way way way to small. Made in China. Will be returning today. Looks cute though. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Kupcake622

customer_reviews.title: Poor color and graphic peels off
customer_reviews.text: My son has worn his orange rashguard only twice. It is no longer orange, but now peach with orange stitching. The large, prominent logo on the front has already started to peel off. Rashguard had been washed on normal, cold wash, line dried. Last year, we ordered this exact rashguard in Navy. The color remained vivid, and the logo began peeling by the end of the season, which was many times worn in comparison to thus years.
customer_reviews.author: family adventure

customer_reviews.title: Runs too small!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these..the colors are nice but they rin SO SMALL! My 8 year old barely fits into an 8/10 in Target clothes and my other son fits into a 12/14 in Target as well.....the 12 fits like a 8 and the 8 fits like a 6. The sleeves were long but even the 12/14 felt too tight in my 8 year old. Please make them bigger!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mamag

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made but great fit.
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they are bright, fit tight and worked perfectly for our vacation. HOWEVER, they bleed. I washed them with some items that have white and now there is neon yellow in them. The towels at the pool, neon yellow! Also, the logo started peeling off day one.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Haebler

customer_reviews.title: Good sun protection but wears out quick!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for UV protection, but they fade fast and they wear out quickly. I have only had these for 4 months, and they are already completely faded and ripping. I bought another brand for my toddler at the same time I bought these and that one still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Twins

customer_reviews.title: I will recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 8 for my 7yr old and it fits very well. This is his second Kanu since he started swimming. The first lasted 2 yrs with the color faded slightly. I will recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor J. Ramdhan

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size received
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 5T and received a 4T. Had to send it on vacation with my son because there wasn't time to return it before his trip. Hope I can return it when he gets back.
customer_reviews.author: Tas

customer_reviews.title: I would order again
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute. My son wears 12-18 month and 2T in different brands. He is an average size, 24 lbs. I ordered a 2T it fits perfect it will last the whole summer. Sleeve are a little long like people habe said but they dont get in the way or bother him. I have washed it a couple times and the seam on sleeve has frayed a little but like any kids clothing they dnt wear it for long. With all that said I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: brett a harrison

customer_reviews.title: Works great, runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt to keep my kid from getting sunburned. I was afraid the white shirt was going to be a dirt magnet, but it really doesn't stay dirty, unless you get mud on it. It does seem a bit slim in the chest/under arm area, but definitely meets our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Meggypoo

customer_reviews.title: Great color, quality and fit!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect!! They are slim so I ended up returning them and ordering one size up for easy on and off. The neon color is SUPER HELPFUL when keep track of our kids in a crowd!
customer_reviews.author: LittleB

customer_reviews.title: The white "platinum" swim shirt turns yellow
customer_reviews.text: I bought the white "platinum" swim shirt for my son in February and it's already turned yellow and the logo has peeled off... And this is with our pool only recently opening due to the coronavirus. We took extra care when washing the swim shirt (no bleach, hang to dry), and it's still discolored and falling apart. I'd like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Baum

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the first few wears, but now it looks like loose, baggy, elephant skin!
customer_reviews.text: This rash guard started great. It fit well and was a nice, bright color. However, not even two months of once a week wearing (maybe 6 wears), careful washing, and air drying resulted in this shirt ballooning into something much too big and droopy to wear. It looks like wrinkly, loose elephant skin! The elastic has completely given up the fight. I wish this had stayed it's original size.
customer_reviews.author: Amital

customer_reviews.title: Fits snug, but a great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice material, so far it's holding up well after being worn for 5 days straight during our recent trip to Florida. It definitely protected my son's skin from the sun, 100%. I did not need to apply sunscreen to his torso or arms when he wore this. Fun bright color, true to what you see in pic. It does seem to fit a little snug, but I suppose that's better for water play?! Overall I give this product 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: It was good initially. I thought the material was of good quality. Used it about 3 times before it starting thinning out. The sleeves and trunk of the shirt stretched out so much, the spf protection was now useless. They were now thin and Transparent. It didn't even make it through the summer. I bought 3 of these and 2 went bad. My 3rd one held of probably because my younger one didn't go in the water much. I would expect something like this to last at least a one summers. Disappointed. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: jrab619

customer_reviews.title: Love these shirts
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these shifts for my kids for years. My favorite for outside in the sun and also for water activities the kids love them they come in great colors and comfortable. As a parent love that they are protected from the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: 6 year old son wears a size 6 in shirts and pants. Based on reviews I ordered a size 8 and it is entirely too small! A size 10 ‘might’ fit but I didn’t reorder in the larger size because we were leaving for beach vacation the next day. Really like the red color and the quality seems good (but I can’t speak to how it washes/holds up). It just runs too small.
customer_reviews.author: Kahawai73

customer_reviews.title: Only expect one season out of it
customer_reviews.text: The sleeves stretched out some and the logo started peeling after 3 washes. But my kid says it is comfortable so he keeps wearing it,
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great rashguard! My son loves it! It fits him nicely. He is five years old but is in a six/seven and this size fits him nicely with enough room to most likely fit him next year as well. Have washed it at least ten times and the logo is not yet coming off in the least. Helps if you turn it inside out to wash it, though. The price was perfect and the color is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality swim shirts for our 3-year old. Bought 2. Sizes can vary, not especially consistent between items of the same size. These are OK if they are a little big, they don't have to be skin tight to work well. Suggest you go one size up from normal shirt size.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: orange color fades quick
customer_reviews.text: We love these shirts, but the orange color has faded to a pastel ridiculously quickly. We chose it for safety and it is no longer providing that. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Kers

customer_reviews.title: Great rash guard.
customer_reviews.text: Kanu long sleeve in dark blue, size 4T. It's loose fit on a smaller framed child. Great rash guard, fabric appears to be good quality and thick. Dries quickly. My child loves the shirt. The dark color keeps him warmer when he plays in the water and gets soaked. The size chart provided was accurate.
customer_reviews.author: KateM

customer_reviews.title: Saving our skin...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Fit my 10-year old perfectly and I don't have to deal with sunblock. Win win. I also think it looks adorable.
customer_reviews.author: JLove

customer_reviews.title: Best swim shirt
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE these shirts! They wear well and are super comfortable. We have been buying these exclusively for a few years due to price, comfort and color selection
customer_reviews.author: Andiamo

customer_reviews.title: but fitted (tighter and shorter fit) and won't fit him next year--it's more like a Size 8-10
customer_reviews.text: My son is 11, and the sizes differ, but he typically wears a Youth Medium or Large, or a Size 12 in dress shirts. The Large Size in this swim shirt was ok, but fitted (tighter and shorter fit) and won't fit him next year--it's more like a Size 8-10. The XL (which I would never typically buy him) fit well--was roomy, but still fit well in length and sleeves (not as big as an XL would be in another type of shirt). He's slim, but 5'1" and weighs around 87 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: 3meezers

customer_reviews.title: WAYYYYY too small! I ordered a 4T for my ...
customer_reviews.text: WAYYYYY too small! I ordered a 4T for my average sized 4 year old. This wouldn't even fit a 2 year old. Skin tight. Couldn't even get his head in the hole let alone his arms. Order way up.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: This shirt is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shirt! My son was getting a sunburn in the pool despite wearing two layers of sunscreen and reapplying every 80 minutes. I bought this shirt because I was desperate to find something to protect him. It fit perfectly, matched his swim trunks, and covers him from his neck down to the palms of his hands. He hasn't had a sunburn since I got the shirt in the mail. He enjoys wearing it because he doesn't have to wear as much sunscreen and he feels more comfortable in it. I'm so happy I bought this shirt, and when he no longer fits it I will buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought size XL (14-16) for my 10y old. My son is not skinny and usually wears size 10-12, this is why I ordered larger size . Anyway, the shirt was way too small- probably will fit loosely a 8-10y old kid. I suggest they review their chart for this product. The shirt looked very nice, was long and I would have kept it if my son could've wear it. I needed to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Anduta

customer_reviews.title: It worked wonderfully while we were on vacation in the Virgin Islands ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 8 year old perfectly! He usually wears size 8-10 or boys Medium. It worked wonderfully while we were on vacation in the Virgin Islands - no sunburn, no issues. The only problem I've seen is he got some yellow food on it somewhere, and it now has a very hard to see stain. But that's not the shirt's fault. :)
customer_reviews.author: bcflyer

customer_reviews.title: Runs really small
customer_reviews.text: Seems like pretty good fabric but, I ordered a12/14 for my tall, super thin build 12 yr old and it barely fits my 6 year old order 3 sizes larger than the size chart recommends.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda p

customer_reviews.title: Size up!
customer_reviews.text: My son is about 20th percentile in weight. And 40th percentile in height. This garment fits strange... Arms fit fine, even a little long, but the torso is way too short & a little too tight.
customer_reviews.author: C. Miguez

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these shirts. Neither came in the right size. I bought a 3T and size 6, and received a 2T with 3T tag (see photo!), and a size 8. Do yourself a favor and buy from a more reliable brand!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Major design flaw!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arms are extremely longer than the body. Major design flaw. Shirt fits nice but THE ARMS ARE 4-5 INCHES PAST THE BODY. Like it was made for an Monkey.. Super strange n weird design flaw
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: I really like the qualtiy of these rash guards
customer_reviews.text: The size 12 was the same size as the 10 I bought last year. I really like the qualtiy of these rash guards. I wash them in cold water with no fabric softner and let them air dry and the fabric holds up really well to a summer long of usage. But the sizing is really off.
customer_reviews.author: IreneCG

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 13 year old son as ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13 year old son as the size chart said it was 14-16. I ordered 3 and all of them were for a child of about 8 years of age. Apparently I do not understand their sizing. Most companies do a boys XL 14-16. This 14-16 was for an 8 year old so I am returning all three.
customer_reviews.author: Nettie Atkisson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality! one time use only
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality after one use these things started to fray bad. I bought three of them and they all frayed afrer one use. These things are junk garbage
customer_reviews.author: Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great little rash guard/sun protection, white is see through
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be made well and the arms are the same length, I'd say the size is as expected. I got white and it does appear more see through than I would like but it's going on a boy toddler. Very soft.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict2001

customer_reviews.title: Thread unravels
customer_reviews.text: Thread always unravels. I bought 3 of these and after about 4 wears, the thread is coming off. Not good quality. We've never been burned though.
customer_reviews.author: K. Baggett

customer_reviews.title: Size up!
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because it was too small. However it was very cute! I suggest you size up at least 2 sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Son likes it
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this shirt over his other swim shirts. It fits great and I can tell that he can move freely.
customer_reviews.author: Jerie H.

customer_reviews.title: 2 Small Snags on the back.
customer_reviews.text: Would give 5 starts but it has a couple of small snags on the back. No holes. Fits great. 3T my LO is 3’3” and 37 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Leeleeinjax

customer_reviews.title: I love that it completely covers his arms and torso
customer_reviews.text: Use this with my very fair complected nephew every time he swims. I love that it completely covers his arms and torso, and even partly shields his neck. Sunscreen can be streaky and not always fool-proof. Also, he has very sensitive skin, and so this helps protect him from pool chemicals, etc. It's stayed very bright, and even though it's been accidentally thrown in the dryer a time or two it hasn't melted or shrunk. Very good quality product, and he loves wearing it. Also, it's lighter weight/silkier than a lot of rash guard, which I like because it seems to allow him to move around easier, and he's comfortable wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hammett

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 2 year old. He's on the small side, but the 2T was too small, so I ended up sending it back and getting the 3T. The 3T fits great and seems to protect him from the sun. No sunburn yet!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: This rash guard ran waaay small for my son. Great blue color. I think it was a full size or two small.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4yrs old I purchased an 8 and it fits him perfectly except the arms. The arms are long all I did was fold it back and problem solved! Happy with the shirt and he loves it, its not too tight which is something he usually complains about with other rash guards. Purchased this 2yrs ago and it's still in great shape just purchased a 2nd one for my youngest son. They live these to swim in. We use them in the pool and at the beach
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Okay but short-sleeve seems to be the better option.
customer_reviews.text: After just a few short months, the sleeves have stretched out to the point that my child has to keep freeing his hands during swim lessons. My other child has the short-sleeve version that is the same age and it is holding up much better.
customer_reviews.author: JadeMarie

product_meta.title: Kanu Surf Boys' Platinum Rashguard
product_meta.description:
Kanu surf presents our newest rashguards yet. kanu, a surf & swim lifestyle brand, is well known for great fit, function and colors along with high quality functional apparel for the whole family. all of our rashguards are quick dry and feature a upf 50+ rating to block out the sun's harmful rays. kanu rashguards are designed for surfers of all levels as well as the recreational athlete. they are great for trips to the beach or the pool as well as for lounging around. matching styles for adults are also available so dads and kids can hit the beach scene as a team. our platinum long sleeve rashguard has center chest logo. available in boys 2-16. check out one of our coordinating trunks to make a great set!

Boys 2-5 long sleeve upf 50+ sun protective rashguard
feature_bullets: Long-sleeve rashguard featuring mock neck and logo emblem at center chest
